features: Shell: The outer shell is made of polycarbonate, known for its high resistance to impact and temperature variations
EPS core: A core in EPS(expanded polystyrene)with high impact resistance to better absorb the impact in the event of a collision

Airflow Ventilation System™: Bliz's proprietary Airflow Ventilation System™ was developed using studies of low and high-speed fluid dynamics to provide ideal airflows that vary in and around the helmet depending on each speed. The result is a helmet that offers efficient ventilation for added comfort and safety
Adjustable strap: The neck strap is adjustable at the ears and chin for increased comfort and safety
Two-way adjustment: The helmet shell is adjustable to make it smaller or larger. It also adjusts to the neck from top to bottom for a comfortable and secure fit
